query.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RN, t.*, COUNT(1) over() TOTAL_CNT FROM( SELECT CUSTOMER_CD, GUBN_CD, ACCOUNT_CD, CUSTOMER_NM1 , CUSTOMER_NM2, IV_NM1, IV_NM2, STREET , CITY, DISTRICT, IV_STREET, IV_CITY , IV_DISTRICT, NATION, REGION, POSTALCODE , TELEPHONE1, REP_NM, EMAIL, FAX, URL , INDUSTRY_TYPE, BUSINESS_TYPE , TAX_NM1, TAX_NM2, TAX_NM3, TAX_NM4 , USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, REG_NM , MOD_DT, MOD_ID, MOD_NM FROM TN_CLM_CUSTOMER WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND UPPER(CUSTOMER_NM1) LIKE '%'+ UPPER(:vo.srch_customer) +'%' ) T ) WHERE RN BETWEEN :vo.start_index AND :vo.end_index
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TN_CLM_CUSTOMER WHERE COMP_CD=:vo.session_comp_cd AND GERP_CD=:vo.gerp_cd
